attributes.action: to offer compensation to Equitable Assurance investors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government created  and monitor the Financial and Pensions Regulators and when they fail should compensate investors for the failings.  May we have an early to a Compensation Offer please and a reply to EU comments ?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to offer compensation to Equitable Assurance investors."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21877


Prime Minister's Office
